trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Configuration" /> namespace contains classes that provide configuration for applications and services built using the Windows Identity Foundation (WIF).
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Configuration" /> contém classes que fornecem a configuração de aplicativos e serviços criados com a WIF (Windows Identity Foundation).

trans-unit.source: The classes in this namespace represent settings under the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element.
trans-unit.target: As classes deste namespace representam as configurações no elemento [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md).

trans-unit.source: Classes that configure federation using the WS-Federation protocol are contained primarily in the <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Classes que configuram a federação usando o protocolo Web Services Federation estão contidas principalmente no namespace <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration" />.

trans-unit.source: These settings appear under the [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Essas configurações aparecem sob o elemento [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) em um arquivo de configuração.
